section.name: DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.10 Released
section.p: June 15th 2012- DataNucleus Access Platform 3.0.10 ("Newton") is released. DataNucleus Access Platform provides persistence and retrieval of Java objects to/from a wide range of datastores including RDBMS, db4o, LDAP, XML, and Excel. Version 3.0.10 includes the following changes over 3.0.9

ul.li: JPA : Fix bug with EMF creation when overriding properties are null.
JPA : Fix bug in Criteria FromImpl causing NPE
Fix bug preventing objects created using "identity" strategy from being L2 cached
Fix bug in string conversion of JDOQL Typesafe into String when including equals clause
Add support for detachment of N-1 join table relations.
RDBMS : Fix bug in concurrent access with classes with date types persisted as String

section.p: This release is downloadable under an Apache 2 license from the DataNucleus community site.
